message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $95 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe I can come to an agreement at $85.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate you're interested in the product. I'm willing to go down to $90, but I can't go any lower than that.  What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $87 for the product.
